participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to stay focused and motivated on my writing, even when it's difficult.
someday i would like a truck.
My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.
my mom raised me by herself and taught me to play baseball.
I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.

participant_2.background:
My parents are not tech-savvy, but they are very supportive of my interests.
I enjoyed a cup of chai tea after a long day of knitting.
my wife use to be a teacher.
I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students.
I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.

content.text: Pretty good! I just finished knitting a sweater for my daughter.
That's awesome! I love knitting. I made a scarf for my mom last Christmas.
That's so sweet! My mom is not very tech-savvy, so she loves when I make her things.
Mine either! But she loves my writing.
I'm a writer. I write short stories and poetry.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write a novel.
Maybe I will. Do you have any advice?
Just start writing. The first draft is always the worst, but it's a good place to start.
Thanks! I'll keep that in mind.
